article.title: Galaxy @ eResearch Australasia 2020

article.content:
• Galaxy @ eResearch Australasia 2020

Galaxy @ eResearch Australasia 2020

These presentations at eResearch Australasia are particularly relevant to the Galaxy community:

Date Time Title Presenter
20 October 12:20 Galaxy Australia’s role in responding to the COVID-19 pandemic Simon Gladman
13:30 BoF: COVID-19 eResearch Experiences and Collaborations in Australasia and Southeast Asia – Upskilling Support for Pandemic Response, Preparedness and Recovery Idris Sulaiman
22 October 12:00 Galaxy Australia – a 2020 update Gareth Price, Simon Gladman
23 October 14:40 Galaxy Australia and CloudStor (AARNet) – creating linkages between two national resources Nuwan Goonasekera, Gareth Price
TBD TBD Poster: Enabling Genomic Analysis to Improve Risk Characterisation in Australia’s Red Meat Industry Derek Benson

All times are AEDT.
